original_title: 着エロイメージアイドルの大胆宣言！ SNSフォロワー一万人でAVデビュー！！ AV出演宣言からセックス解禁までの約180日間の全記録！！

While the numbers are growing steadily, the momentum accelerates at once with the introduction of a boy Ti●t●ker! Arrive in time! "I will respond to everyone's expectations for my debut!" title: A Non-Nude Erotica Image Idol Makes An Outrageous Announcement! She's Got 10,000 Followers And Now She's Making Her Adult Video Debut!!
